title: Parshin's method and the geometric Bombieri-Lang conjecture
abstract:
In this short survey, we explain Parshin's proof of the geometric
Bombieri-Lang conjecture, and show that it can be used to give an alternative
proof of Xie-Yuan's recent resolution of the geometric Bombieri-Lang conjecture
for projective varieties with empty special locus and admitting a finite
morphism to a traceless abelian variety.
